sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Grocery Initiative Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Grocery Initiative Act.

sections.heading: Grocery Initiative Study. The Department shall, subject to appropriation, study  food insecurity in urban and rural food deserts
sections.text: The study may include an exploration of the reasons for current market failures, potential policy solutions, geographic trends, and the need for independent grocers, an

sections.heading: Grocery Initiative Grants and Financial Support.
sections.text: Grocery Initiative Grants and Financial Support.

sections.heading: Rulemaking. The Department shall adopt   rules to implement and administer this Act.
sections.text: Rulemaking. The Department shall adopt rules to implement and administer this Act.
